drupalNodeEvent.title: China Now Music Festival: China and Beethoven, "Beethoven is Us"

field_speakers.processed: Jindong Cai (Bard College), Fang Jing (Shanghai Concert Hall), playwright Yuanlai Jiang, directors Bing Yue, Ruijia Gao, musical director Weijie Li, actors Keren Zhou, Fan Jia

field_organizers.processed: US-China Music Institute of the Bard College Conservatory of Music

field_description.processed: Host Jindong Cai and guests will offer a peek into the Chinese market for all things Beethoven, including a musical based on Beethoven’s life, a play describing how his music became known in China, and an ‘immersive multimedia Beethoven experience’ exhibition at the Shanghai Concert Hall.
